short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the retry button in GitLab CI when it is available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitLab CI Auto Refresh & Job Control is the ultimate productivity tool for developers and teams working with GitLab CI/CD pipelines.

This extension automates pipeline monitoring by refreshing the page at customizable intervals, ensuring you always stay up-to-date with the latest job statuses. Additionally, it helps you manage the number of running jobs by setting a maximum threshold, preventing unnecessary resource overload.

Key Features:
•	Auto Refresh: Automatically refresh GitLab CI pages at intervals defined by you.
•	Job Control: Limit the maximum number of running jobs to stay within your desired threshold.
•	Customizable Settings: Easily configure refresh intervals and job limits via a user-friendly interface.
•	Tab-Specific Control: Enable or disable the extension on a per-tab basis for maximum flexibility.
•	Simple Activation: Quickly toggle the extension by clicking its toolbar icon.

This extension is perfect for developers, DevOps engineers, and teams who rely on GitLab CI for their daily workflows. Whether you’re monitoring pipelines, waiting for builds, or managing job resources, this tool saves time and optimizes your process.

Privacy Policy:

We respect your privacy. This extension does not collect, store, or share any personal data. All configurations are saved locally on your device.

Take control of your GitLab CI/CD workflows today and streamline your development process with GitLab CI Auto Refresh & Job Control!
